comment.author: 55198937@N05
comment._content: Some progress in Summer Street, when compared to the 1870s photo from the Holtermann Collection of the State Library of NSW: acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemLarge.aspx?itemID=63372

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/angeljim46] There sure is a difference! Thanks for adding this photo for comparison.

AB

comment.author: 35654989@N03
comment._content:
Interesting Photo ! 
The building with the awning at left of picture is gone, but the others remain.
The middle building is the Post Office & the 3rd building is the Western Stores / Myer / Grace Bros / Myer store.

Funny ! the traffic lights are missing from the middle of the road. (just kidding !)
